## Introduction

Here are two ocean and climate indicators for the Palau EEZ.  Have questions or 
want to suggest a change?  Simply [create an issue](https://github.com/pwoodworth-jefcoats/Palau-ocean-climate/issues) or email [phoebe.woodworth-jefcoats@noaa.gov](phoebe.woodworth-jefcoats@noaa.gov).
